All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class AskHelpDialog
extends CustomDialog

Dialog that allows a player to request help of another player during a battle.

private  void makeHelpDecision(Player selectedPlayer)
          Determines whether the selected player will help in the battle or not, depending of the player/helper benefit and the treasures offered then accepts or declines accordingly if a computer or allows player to accept offer or not.

Constructor Detail

AskHelpDialog

public AskHelpDialog(Battle b,
                     boolean hasKneepads)
Creates a new AskHelpDialog Dialog.

Parameters:
b - currently on-going battle
hasKneepads - true if active player is wearing Kneepads of Allure; false otherwise
Method Detail

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean b)
Overrides:
setVisible in class java.awt.Dialog

makeHelpDecision

private void makeHelpDecision(Player selectedPlayer)
Determines whether the selected player will help in the battle or not, depending of the player/helper benefit and the treasures offered then accepts or declines accordingly if a computer or allows player to accept offer or not.

Parameters:
selectedPlayer - computer player to check
